member.name: T:PX.GLAnomalyDetection.AnomalyTransactionEnq.GLTranScoreCurrent.mlStatus
member.summary: 0 - not sent 1000 - 1999 - predicted 2000 - sent new to predict 3000 - sent new to train 4000 - sent predicted or trained 5000 - 5999 - predicted and trained 1 - addition to mark as lack of data 10 - addition to mark as correct

member.name: P:PX.GLAnomalyDetection.MLStatusLink.Selected
member.summary: Indicates whether the record is selected for mass processing.

member.name: M:PX.GLAnomalyDetection.AnomalyDetectionWebClient.GetTrainingStatus(System.Uri)
member.summary: the status gives either 202, while it is working, or 200, then the response body will contain the metrics of this training

member.name: M:PX.GLAnomalyDetection.AnomalyDetectionWebClient.GetPredictionStatus(System.Uri)
member.summary: the status url returns either 202 Accepted or 200 OK, in the latter case, the response will contain the result field with the address from where to take the scoring result
